executiveSummary: Rada and Doug, married runners from Orlando, Florida, pitched their product Night Runner 270—shoe lights providing 270° visibility—to the Sharks, seeking $250,000 for 10% equity. After multiple competitive offers and negotiations, they accepted Robert Herjavec’s offer of $250,000 for 30% equity to support product expansion, particularly into the occupational safety market.
keyDecisions: Rada and Doug accepted Robert Herjavec’s offer of $250,000 for 30% equity in Night Runner 270.

actionItems.task: Expand product line to include Night Shift version for occupational safety market
Use investment to scale inventory and meet growing demand

nextSteps: Rada and Doug will collaborate with Robert Herjavec to scale production, enhance product battery life for industrial use, and expand distribution to both athletic and occupational safety markets.
